allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add Arabic title field, mandatory National ID upload, and form error UX improvements

- Add titleAr field to vetMembers schema, approve API, ID card API, and card preview
- Add Arabic title input to both syndicate and branch review pages
- Show validation errors near submit button in VetApplicationForm
- Make National ID Card upload mandatory with bilingual error message
- Fix pre-existing educationLevel reference \(replaced with scientificRank\)
- Include edit/delete functionality, tracking URL display, and form updates from prior work

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
